#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;

inline void scanint(long long int* x)
{
	register char c = getchar_unlocked();
	*x = 0;
	for(; (c<48)||(c>57);c = getchar_unlocked());
	for(; (c>47)&&(c<58);c = getchar_unlocked())
		*x = (long long int)((((*x)<<1ll) + ((*x)<<3ll)) + c - 48);
}
inline void printint(long int n)
{
	if(n == 0)
	{
		putchar_unlocked('0');
		putchar_unlocked('\n');
	}
	else
	{
		char buf[20];
		buf[19] = '\n';
		int i = 18;
		while(n)
		{
			buf[i--] = n % 10 + '0';
			n /= 10;
		}
		while(buf[i] != '\n')
			putchar_unlocked(buf[++i]);
	}
}

long long int a[1000010];

int main(){

         
          long long int n,i,maxi=LLONG_MIN,j,tmp,e,o,k,ans=0;
          scanint(&n);
          for(i=0;i<n;i++){
               scanint(&a[i]);
               maxi=max(maxi,a[i]);
          }

          j=ceil(log2(maxi));

          for(i=0;i<=32;i++){
              tmp=(1ll<<i);
              e=0;
              o=0;
              for(k=0;k<n;k++){
                  if((a[k]&tmp)!=0)
                    o++;
                  else e++;
              }
              ans+=o*e*tmp;
          }

          cout<<ans<<endl;






}
